name: Mustafa Mahmoud
title: Senior Mobile Engineer
summary: Highly skilled Senior Flutter Engineer with extensive experience in cross-platform mobile application development. Currently driving innovation at The Address Holding, specializing in Flutter framework and modern mobile development practices. Proven track record of delivering scalable, high-performance mobile solutions with a strong focus on user experience and code quality. Demonstrated leadership in technical decision-making and mentoring development teams.

education.degree: Bachelor Degree, Systems and Computers Engineering

highlights: Manage daily IT operations and safeguard employee data through advanced security measures.
Install and maintain hardware and software; lead technical decisions and mentoring.
Built customized POS system for restaurants and markets that reduced order processing time by 50%, increased client sales by 20%.
Implemented real-time sales tracking and inventory features reducing waste by 25%.
Implemented multiple apps using 100% Dart; developed cross-platform features from scratch.
